metadata.title: CVE-2024-56378 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
libpoppler.so in Poppler through 24.12.0 has an out-of-bounds readvulnerability within the JBIG2Bitmap::combine function in JBIG2Stream.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-56378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6
libpoppler-glib8 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6
libpoppler118 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6
poppler-utils - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.02.0-2ubuntu0.6').
